name: C. Paint the Array
statement:
You are given an array a consisting of n positive integers. You have to
choose a positive integer d and paint all elements into two colors. All
elements which are divisible by d will be painted red, and all other
elements will be painted blue.The coloring is called beautiful if there
are no pairs of adjacent elements with the same color in the array. Your
task is to find any value of d which yields a beautiful coloring, or
report that it is impossible.
